description: This source file contains C code implementing a utility function `print_callback` used for formatted printing of different data types, including string, IPv4, and bytes, with special handling for IPv4 addresses. It includes licensing information, includes necessary headers, and is part of a larger IEEE 1905.1/1a stack project.

methods.name: void print_callback(void (* write_function)(const char * fmt,...),const char * prefix,size_t size,const char * name,const char * fmt,void * p)
methods.description: Formats and prints data based on provided format string, with special handling for strings, IPv4 addresses, and byte sequences.

ctags.name: print_callback

ctags.signature: (void (* write_function)(const char * fmt,...),const char * prefix,size_t size,const char * name,const char * fmt,void * p)
